pronunciation: TARE, [I know not the origin of this word. See the next word.]

definitions.text:
Tare
1. weed that grows among corn.
Declare to us parable tares field. Matthew 13:36.
2. In agriculture, plant vetch kind, which there two sorts, purple flowered spring summer tare and purple-flowered wild winter tare It much cultivated England for fodder.
TARE,

1. In commerce, deficiency weight quantity goods by reason weight cask, bag other thing containing commodity, and which weighed with it; hence, allowance abatement certain weight quantity from weight quantity commodity sold cask, chest, bag like, which seller makes to buyer on account weight such cask, chest bag; abatement may be on price commodity sold. When tare deducted, remainder called net neat weight.
TARE,

To ascertain mark amount tare
TARE, old
